titleInfo.title: Radical cation cyclization of cyclopropyl silyl ethers induced by PET : synthetic applications for the construction of polycyclic compounds, and Photoacylation of 1,4-naphthoquinones : a concise access to the biologically active quinonoid compounds

mods.abstract: New synthetic methodology for the synthesis of key intermediates which could lead to the total synthesis of biologically active compounds.

bibliographicCitation.harvard1: Waske, P.A., 2006. Radical cation cyclization of cyclopropyl silyl ethers induced by PET : synthetic applications for the construction of polycyclic compounds, and Photoacylation of 1,4-naphthoquinones : a concise access to the biologically active quinonoid compounds, Bielefeld (Germany): Bielefeld University.
